mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_GENDER, USER_EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_PHONE, USER_KIND FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'true'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_ID = #{userId}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname}, USER_GENDER = #{userGender}, USER_BIRTHDAY = #{userBirthday}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, MODIFY_DATE = current_timestamp WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
